column1: Youssoufia (Arabic: اليوسفية) is the capital of Youssoufia Province in Marrakesh-Safi
column2: Morocco. In the 2014 Moroccan census it recorded a population of 67
column5: 518 ten years ago.It is known for its phosphate production. The city was founded in 1931 by the French when they began to exploit the phosphate deposits of the Gantour basin.
